Caption: Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communication) presents a Trophy to Mr. Sivaram (1966 batch, Hockey Captain)
Description: The Chief Guest, Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communication) distributed a number of prizes to students and faculty members at the Third Institute Day. The Institute Day of IIT Madras is a day marked to celebrate the hard work and success of certain people who have shown excellence in academics as well as extracurricular activities. In the image, Dr. P. Subbarayan presents a Trophy to Mr. Sivaram (1966 batch, Hockey Captain). The gentleman in the background has been identified as Mr, Dubey. Identification by Mr. K. Narayanan, Mr. C. V. Sahasranamam and Mr. Anand Singh Bawa
